TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jails[COLOR_REVERT] lower a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]War Weariness[COLOR_REVERT] and increase espionage significantly. Build them if you are involved in a long war and your citizens are starting to complain.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Prisons[COLOR_REVERT] réduisent le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mécontentement dû à la guerre[COLOR_REVERT] dans les villes et améliorent nettement l'espionnage. Construisez-en si vous êtes en guerre depuis longtemps et que vos citoyens commencent à se plaindre.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gefängnisse[COLOR_REVERT] senken die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kriegsmüdigkeit[COLOR_REVERT] einer Stadt und steigern die Spionageleistung deutlich. Bauen Sie sie, wenn sich Ihre Bevölkerung angesichts eines lange andauernden Krieges zu beschweren beginnt.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]prigione[COLOR_REVERT] riduce la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]stanchezza della guerra[COLOR_REVERT] di una città e aumenta in maniera significativa la resa dello Spionaggio. Costruiscila quando ti troverai coinvolto in una lunga guerra e i tuoi cittadini iniziano a lamentarsi.
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cárceles[COLOR_REVERT] reducen el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hastío bélico[COLOR_REVERT] de la ciudad y aumentan el espionaje significativamente. Conviene construirlas cuando se está enzarzado en una larga guerra y los ciudadanos se empiezan a quejar.

TEXT.English: Build this low powered melee combat unit to provide your army with quick response defensive units.
TEXT.French: Produisez cette unité peu puissante de combat rapproché pour fournir rapidement à votre armée des unités défensives.
TEXT.German: Mit diesen ansonsten eher schwachen Nahkampfeinheiten stellen Sie Ihren Truppen Defensivkämpfer für schnelle Gegenangriffe zur Seite.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci questa unit da combattimento in mischia poco potente per integrare il tuo esercito con unit di difesa a risposta rapida.
TEXT.Spanish: Construye esta unidad de combate cuerpo a cuerpo, poco poderosa, para dotar a tu ejército con unidades defensivas de respuesta rpida.

TEXT.English: Mounted Swordsmen are designed to help fill the gaps left by Mongol Horse Archers. Use them to take out enemy units with the goal of killing Mounted units.
TEXT.French: Les spadassins montés permettent de combler les vides laissés par les archers montés mongols. Utilisez-les pour éliminer les unités ennemies et en particulier les unités montées.
TEXT.German: Die Aufgabe der berittenen Schwertkämpfer besteht darin, die von den berittenen mongolischen Bogenschützen hinterlassenen Lücken zu füllen und feindliche berittene Militäreinheiten auszuschalten.
TEXT.Italian: Gli spadaccini a cavallo avevano il compito di arrivare laddove non erano arrivati gli arcieri a cavallo mongoli. Impiegali per eliminare le unità nemiche con lo scopo di uccidere le unità montate.
TEXT.Spanish: Los jinetes con espada sirven para encargarse de aquellas tareas para las que los arqueros a caballo mongoles no son aptos. Utilízalos para acabar con las unidades enemigas que amenacen tu caballería.

TEXT.English: This mounted unit is very powerful for early in the game and is a great counter to an enemy with catapults.
TEXT.French: Cette unité montée est particulièrement efficace dans les premières phases du jeu et s'avère très utile face à un ennemi disposant de catapultes.
TEXT.German: Diese berittene Einheit ist in den frühen Phasen des Spiels sehr effizient und eignet sich hervorragend für Angriffe auf feindliche Katapulte.
TEXT.Italian: Questa unit montante molto potente nelle prime fasi della partita ed ottima per contrastare le catapulte nemiche.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad montada es muy poderosa al principio del juego, y sirve para contrarrestar a un enemigo que disponga de catapultas.

TEXT.English: More well-suited for defense than the speedy mounted troops, they are best used to defend cities and rough terrain.
TEXT.French: Meilleurs en défense que les troupes montées se déplaçant rapidement, ils sont mieux adaptés aux terrains accidentés et la défense des villes.
TEXT.German: Weil sie bessere Defensivqualitäten aufweisen als die schnellen berittenen Truppen, eignen sich diese Einheiten vor allem zur Verteidigung von Städten und rauem Gelände.
TEXT.Italian: Più atti a difendere delle veloci unità a cavallo, sono molto utili per difendere le città e i terreni accidentati.
TEXT.Spanish: Tropas más aptas para la defensa que la veloz caballería mongola, conviene reservarlas para la defensa de las ciudades y de las zonas de terreno accidentado.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academies[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]académies militaires[COLOR_REVERT] augmentent la production d'unités militaires de la ville.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Militärakademie[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die städtische Produktion militärischer Einheiten.
TEXT.Italian: Questa [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Accademia militare[COLOR_REVERT] incrementa la produzione di unit militari della citt.
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academias militares[COLOR_REVERT] aumentan la produccin de unidades militares de una ciudad.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] provide your mounted units with additional experience.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]écuries[COLOR_REVERT] octroient de l'expérience supplémentaire à vos unités montes.
TEXT.German: Durch die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stallungen[COLOR_REVERT] erhalten Ihre berittenen Einheiten zusätzliche Erfahrungspunkte.
TEXT.Italian: Queste [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stalle[COLOR_REVERT] danno un bonus di esperienza alle unit a cavallo.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Establos[COLOR_REVERT] otorgan ms experiencia a tus unidades montadas.

TEXT.English: This improvement allows you to harvest [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Olives[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Cette amélioration vous permet de cultiver des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]olives[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Diese Modernisierung ermöglicht die Verarbeitung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oliven[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Questo miglioramento ti consente di raccogliere le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]olive[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Esta mejora te permite cosechar [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aceitunas[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Naval Warfare[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Galley[COLOR_REVERT] unit.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]navigation à voile[COLOR_REVERT] permet de construire des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]galères[COLOR_REVERT] et de faire du commerce le long des côtes. Elle permet aussi la construction de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]phares[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Segeln[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglicht Ihnen den Bau einer [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Triere[COLOR_REVERT], den Küstenhandel und die Errichtung eines [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Leuchtturms[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Navigazione[COLOR_REVERT] permette la realizzazione di [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]galee[COLOR_REVERT]. Inoltre, premette gli scambi marittimi e la costruzione del miglioramento cittadino [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]faro[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Navegación a vela[COLOR_REVERT] permite construir la unidad de la [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galera[COLOR_REVERT]. También activa el intercambio costero y la construcción de la mejora urbana del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Faro[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Ritualism[COLOR_REVERT] allows [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monuments[COLOR_REVERT]. It also leads to [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mysticism[COLOR_REVERT], which leads further to discovering the first religions.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]mysticisme[COLOR_REVERT] permet de construire l'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obélisque[COLOR_REVERT] et [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stonehenge[COLOR_REVERT]. Il mène aussi à la [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]méditation[COLOR_REVERT] et au [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]polythéisme[COLOR_REVERT], ces deux technologies permettant au joueur en ayant fait la découverte en premier de fonder une religion.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mystik[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglicht den Bau von [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisken[COLOR_REVERT] und des Wunders von [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stonehenge[COLOR_REVERT]. Darüber hinaus legt sie den Grundstein für die [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Meditation[COLOR_REVERT] und den [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Polytheismus[COLOR_REVERT]. Der Entdecker des Polytheismus bzw. der Meditation erhält eine Religion.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Misticismo[COLOR_REVERT] permette la realizzazione di [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]obelischi[COLOR_REVERT] e della Meraviglia [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stonehenge[COLOR_REVERT]. Inoltre, conduce alla [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Meditazione[COLOR_REVERT] e al [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Politeismo[COLOR_REVERT], ciascuno delle quali fornisce una religione alla civiltà che le scopre per prima.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Misticismo[COLOR_REVERT] permite los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obeliscos[COLOR_REVERT] y la maravilla de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stonehenge[COLOR_REVERT]. También lleva a la [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Meditación[COLOR_REVERT] y al [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Politeísmo[COLOR_REVERT], cada uno de los cuales proporciona una religión al primero que lo descubra.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Elephant Riding[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Elephant Rider[COLOR_REVERT] unit, and later on [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT] unit (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT])
TEXT.French: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Elephant Riding[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Elephant Rider[COLOR_REVERT] unit, and later on [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT] unit (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT])
TEXT.German: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Elephant Riding[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Elephant Rider[COLOR_REVERT] unit, and later on [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT] unit (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT])
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Elephant Riding[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Elephant Rider[COLOR_REVERT] unit, and later on [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT] unit (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT])
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Elephant Riding[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Elephant Rider[COLOR_REVERT] unit, and later on [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT] unit (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT])

TEXT.English: Well-suited unit against mounted and siege units. Gets bonus when attacking city and may also build roads and some other basic improvements.
TEXT.French: Well-suited unit against mounted and siege units. Gets bonus when attacking city and may also build roads and some other basic improvements.
TEXT.German: Well-suited unit against mounted and siege units. Gets bonus when attacking city and may also build roads and some other basic improvements.
TEXT.Italian: Well-suited unit against mounted and siege units. Gets bonus when attacking city and may also build roads and some other basic improvements.
TEXT.Spanish: Well-suited unit against mounted and siege units. Gets bonus when attacking city and may also build roads and some other basic improvements.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Port[COLOR_REVERT] increases that city's income from trade routes. It increases a city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT] resources.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Port[COLOR_REVERT] increases that city's income from trade routes. It increases a city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT] resources.
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Port[COLOR_REVERT] increases that city's income from trade routes. It increases a city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT] resources.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Astronomy[COLOR_REVERT] allows access to the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fluyt[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Gunpowder[COLOR_REVERT]) and the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleon[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Naval Cannons[COLOR_REVERT]). [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Magnetic Levitation[COLOR_REVERT] is required for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orbital Factories[COLOR_REVERT] and it obsoletes Edison's Workshop.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Biological Warfare[COLOR_REVERT] allows construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Biological Warfare Missiles,[COLOR_REVERT] [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Biological Warfare Labs,[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]New League of Nations[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Biological Warfare Missiles[COLOR_REVERT] can attack enemy units in the field. They can also target cities, reducing the city's population as well as damaging any units in the city.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Biological Warfare Labs[COLOR_REVERT] allow construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Biological Warfare Missiles[COLOR_REVERT]. They allow you to turn 1 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Citizen[COLOR_REVERT] into a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT]. Bio-Labs decrease [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Happiness[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Healthiness[COLOR_REVERT] by 1 each.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Centers for Disease Control[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Heals[COLOR_REVERT] all units in the city an extra 25%/turn. It increases [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Health[COLOR_REVERT] in ALL cities by +2, and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Happiness[COLOR_REVERT] by +1. Two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Citizens[COLOR_REVERT] can be turned into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientists,[COLOR_REVERT] and the city is more likely to generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Aegis Cruisers[COLOR_REVERT] carry up to 2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missiles[COLOR_REVERT]. They have a 50% chance to intercept [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Aircraft[COLOR_REVERT], and they can [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cities (-10%/Turn).
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Aegis Cruisers[COLOR_REVERT] carry up to 2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missiles[COLOR_REVERT]. They have a 50% chance to intercept [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Aircraft[COLOR_REVERT], and they can [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cities (-10%/Turn).

They increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Trade Routes[COLOR_REVERT] by +1. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Aquaculture[COLOR_REVERT] increases the food and gold production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT] by +1 each and allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submerged Town[COLOR_REVERT] platforms which are used to construct [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Submerged Town[COLOR_REVERT] coastal improvement.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Aquaculture[COLOR_REVERT] increases the food and gold production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT] by +1 each and allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submerged Town[COLOR_REVERT] platforms which are used to construct [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Submerged Town[COLOR_REVERT] coastal improvement

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Bionics[COLOR_REVERT] permits construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mind Control Centers[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows training of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Automatons[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Bionique[COLOR_REVERT] permet la construction des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Centres de contrôle mental[COLOR_REVERT]. Elle permet également d'entraîner des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Automates[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Bionik[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglicht den Bau von [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bewusstseinskontrollzentren[COLOR_REVERT] und die Ausbildung von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Robotersoldaten[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Bionica[COLOR_REVERT] permette la costruzione dei [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Centri di controllo mentale[COLOR_REVERT]. Permette anche l'addestramento degli [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Automi[COLOR_REVER
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]biónica[COLOR_REVERT] permite la construcción de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]centros de control mental[COLOR_REVERT]. También permite entrenar a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]autómatas[COLOR_REVER

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Automatons[COLOR_REVERT] are cheap, low-skilled clone infantry. Use them when you need to crank out units fast!
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Automates[COLOR_REVERT] sont des unités d'infanterie bon marché mais peu qualifiées. Utilisez-les lorsque vous avez besoin de gonfler rapidement les rangs de votre armée !
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Robotersoldaten[COLOR_REVERT] dienen als preiswerte, minimal qualifizierte Kloninfanterie. Ihr Einsatz lohnt sich vor allem dann, wenn es darum geht, schnellstmöglich Einheiten ins Feld zu schicken!
TEXT.Italian: Gli [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Automi[COLOR_REVERT] sono fanteria clonata a basso costo e con poche abilità. Usali quando vuoi produrre unità rapidament
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]autómatas[COLOR_REVERT] son infantería barata y poco especializada. ¡Úsalos cuando necesites producir unidades rápidament

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Cold Fusion[COLOR_REVERT] permits construction of the mighty [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnought[COLOR_REVERT] super-tank!
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fusion froide[COLOR_REVERT] permet la construction du tank surpuissant [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnought[COLOR_REVERT] !
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Kaltfusion[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglicht den Bau des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnoughts[COLOR_REVERT], eines mächtigen Superpanzers!
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fusione a freddo[COLOR_REVERT] permette la costruzione del temibile super-carro armato [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnought[COLOR_REVER
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]fusión fría[COLOR_REVERT] permite la construcción del poderoso supertanque [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]dreadnought[COLOR_REVER

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Cybernetics[COLOR_REVERT] allows production of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cyborg[COLOR_REVERT] unit. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nanoids[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Cybernétique[COLOR_REVERT] permet la production du [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cyborg[COLOR_REVERT]. Elle permet également la promotion des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nanites[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Kybernetik[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglicht die Produktion der Einheit [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cyborg[COLOR_REVERT] und stellt die Beförderung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nanoiden[COLOR_REVERT] zur Verfügung.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Cibernetica[COLOR_REVERT] permette la produzione dell'unità [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cyborg[COLOR_REVERT]. Inoltre abilita la promozione [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nanoidi[COLOR_REVER
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]cibernética[COLOR_REVERT] permite la creación de unidades [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ciborg[COLOR_REVERT]. También activa el ascenso a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]nanoides[COLOR_REVER

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] enables construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arcologies.[COLOR_REVERT] It allows the construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Shield[COLOR_REVERT] and allows to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnought Armor[COLOR_REVERT] and allows to upgrade your units with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Electro-Magnetic Shield MK III[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shielding III[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] enables construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arcologies.[COLOR_REVERT] It allows the construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Shield[COLOR_REVERT] and allows to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnought Armor[COLOR_REVERT] and allows to upgrade your units with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Electro-Magnetic Shield MK III[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shielding III[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] enables construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arcologies.[COLOR_REVERT] It allows the construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Shield[COLOR_REVERT] and allows to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnought Armor[COLOR_REVERT] and allows to upgrade your units with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Electro-Magnetic Shield MK III[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shielding III[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] enables construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arcologies.[COLOR_REVERT] It allows the construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Shield[COLOR_REVERT] and allows to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnought Armor[COLOR_REVERT] and allows to upgrade your units with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Electro-Magnetic Shield MK III[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shielding III[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] enables construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arcologies.[COLOR_REVERT] It allows the construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Shield[COLOR_REVERT] and allows to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnought Armor[COLOR_REVERT] and allows to upgrade your units with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Electro-Magnetic Shield MK III[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shielding III[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Construct mighty [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnoughts[COLOR_REVERT] when you seek to bring terror and defeat to your puny enemies!
TEXT.French: Construisez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnoughts[COLOR_REVERT] pour terroriser vos ennemis avant de les écrabouiller !
TEXT.German: Die mächtigen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnoughts[COLOR_REVERT] versetzen den Feind in Angst und Schrecken und bezwingen ihn restlos!
TEXT.Italian: Se desideri infliggere terrore e sconfitte ai tuoi poveri nemici costruisci i potentissimi [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dreadnought[COLOR_REVER
TEXT.Spanish: Construye poderosos [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]dreadnoughts[COLOR_REVERT] cuando quieras sembrar el terror y derrotar a tus endebles enemigo

TEXT.English: Construct the massive [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Assault Mechs[COLOR_REVERT] when you wish to stomp your foes into messy paste!
TEXT.French: Construisez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Robots de combat[COLOR_REVERT] pour transformer vos ennemis en chair à saucisse !
TEXT.German: Mithilfe robuster [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Angriffsroboter[COLOR_REVERT] lässt sich der Feind in Grund und Boden stampfen!
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci gli enormi [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mech d'assalto[COLOR_REVERT] quando vuoi schiacciare i nemici come formich
TEXT.Spanish: Construye los enormes [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]mechs de asalto[COLOR_REVERT] cuando quieras pisotear a tus enemigos hasta convertirlos en una masa amorf

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cyborgs[COLOR_REVERT] are upgraded models of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Automatons[COLOR_REVERT]. They ignore [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Terrain Movement Costs[COLOR_REVERT] and have a 30% chance of intercepting enemy [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Aircraft[COLOR_REVERT]. They are slightly weaker than [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mechanized Infantry[COLOR_REVERT], but they cost a whole lot less to build.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cyborgs[COLOR_REVERT] sont des modèles évolués d'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Automates[COLOR_REVERT]. Ils ignorent les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]pénalités de mouvement du terrain[COLOR_REVERT] et ont 30% de chances d'intercepter un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Avion[COLOR_REVERT] ennemi. Un peu plus faibles que les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Infanteries mécanisées[COLOR_REVERT], ils sont aussi moins coûteux à produire.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cyborgs[COLOR_REVERT] sind verbesserte Modelle der [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Robotersoldaten[COLOR_REVERT]. Sie verursachen keine [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gelände-Fortbewegungskosten[COLOR_REVERT] und besitzen eine 30%%-ige Wahrscheinlichkeit für das Abfangen feindlicher [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Flugzeuge[COLOR_REVERT]. Darüber hinaus sind sie etwas schwächer als die [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mechanisierte Infanterie[COLOR_REVERT], kosten aber auch weitaus weniger.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cyborg[COLOR_REVERT] sono versioni migliorate degli [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Automi[COLOR_REVERT]. Ignorano i [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Costi di movimento sul terreno[COLOR_REVERT] e hanno il 30% di probabilità di intercettare [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Aerei[COLOR_REVERT] nemici. Sono leggermente più deboli della [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fanteria meccanizzata[COLOR_REVERT], ma costruirli costa molto men
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ciborgs[COLOR_REVERT] son modelos modernizados de los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]autómatas[COLOR_REVERT]. Ignoran los [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]costes de movimiento por terreno[COLOR_REVERT] y tienen una probabilidad del 30%% de interceptar [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]aeronaves[COLOR_REVERT] enemigas. Son algo más débiles que la [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]infantería mecanizada[COLOR_REVERT], pero cuestan mucho menos de construi

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Advanced Shielding[COLOR_REVERT] provides increased protection for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arcologies[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Boucliers Atm. Avancs[COLOR_REVERT] offrent une meilleure protection aux [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arcologies[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fortgeschrittene Schild[COLOR_REVERT] bietet besseren Schutz für [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arkologien[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Gli [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Scudi avanzanti[COLOR_REVERT] forniscono una maggiore protezione alle [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arcologie[COLOR_REVER
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]escudo avanzado[COLOR_REVERT] proporciona más protección a las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]arcologías[COLOR_REVER

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mind-Control Centers[COLOR_REVERT] remove all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Unhappiness[COLOR_REVERT] in a city, but they reduce the city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Production[COLOR_REVERT] by -25%.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Centres de contrôle mental[COLOR_REVERT] suppriment le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mécontentement[COLOR_REVERT] dans une ville, mais ils réduisent aussi sa [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Production[COLOR_REVERT] de -15%.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bewusstseinskontrollzentren[COLOR_REVERT] eliminieren sämtliche [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Unzufriedenheit[COLOR_REVERT] in einer Stadt, reduzieren jedoch gleichzeitig die städtische [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Produktion[COLOR_REVERT] um -15%%.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Centri di controllo mentale[COLOR_REVERT] eliminano tutta l'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Infelicità[COLOR_REVERT] di una città, ma ne riducono la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Produzione[COLOR_REVERT] del 1
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]centros de control mental[COLOR_REVERT] eliminan toda la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]infelicidad[COLOR_REVERT] en una ciudad, pero reducen su [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]producción[COLOR_REVERT] en un -1

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]New League of Nations[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder triggers [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Global Elections.[COLOR_REVERT] It guarantees elegibility for [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Diplomatic Votes[COLOR_REVERT] (It is identical to the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]United Nations[COLOR_REVERT] wonder from the main game.)
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nouvelle Société des Nations[COLOR_REVERT] déclenche des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Elections mondiales[COLOR_REVERT]. Elle garantit l'éligibilité pour les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]votes diplomatiques[COLOR_REVERT] (son fonctionnement est identique à celui des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nations unies[COLOR_REVERT] dans le jeu classique).
TEXT.German: Das Wunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Neuer Völkerbund[COLOR_REVERT] löst [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Globale Wahlen[COLOR_REVERT] aus und garantiert das Recht auf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Diplomatische Wahlen[COLOR_REVERT]. (Identisch mit dem Wunder [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Vereinte Nationen[COLOR_REVERT] aus dem Hauptspiel.)
TEXT.Italian: La Meraviglia Mondiale [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuova Società delle Nazioni[COLOR_REVERT] attiva le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Elezioni globali.[COLOR_REVERT] Garantisce l'idoneità per i [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Voti diplomatici[COLOR_REVERT]. (È identica alla Meraviglia Mondiale [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nazioni Unite[COLOR_REVERT] del gioco principal
TEXT.Spanish: La gran maravilla del mundo de la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nueva Sociedad de Naciones[COLOR_REVERT] activa el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]sufragio mundial[COLOR_REVERT] y garantiza la validez de los [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]votos diplomáticos[COLOR_REVERT] (es idéntica a la maravilla de las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Naciones Unidas[COLOR_REVERT] del juego principa

TEXT.English: This late-game naval unit is the most deadly ship in the sea, with a high strength and the ability to carry six missiles.
TEXT.French: Cette unité constitue la terreur des mers car elle dispose d'une forte puissance et de la possibilité de transporter des missiles.
TEXT.German: Diese Marineeinheit steht in der Spätphase des Spiels zur Verfügung und stellt dank ihrer hohen Schlagkraft und der Fähigkeit, sechs Raketen zu befördern, das tödlichste Schiff des Spiels dar.
TEXT.Italian: Quest'unità navale avanzata è la più letale nave a solcare i mari, con la sua grande forza e la capacità di trasportare sei missili.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta tardía unidad naval es el barco más mortífero del mar, con una gran fuerza y la capacidad de llevar seis misiles.

TEXT.English: Like [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Workers[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Clones[COLOR_REVERT] improve the land around your cities and build roads that help establish trade routes. (They are faster than [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Workers[COLOR_REVERT], especially at clearing fallout.)
TEXT.French: Comme les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ouvriers[COLOR_REVERT], les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Clones[COLOR_REVERT] peuvent améliorer le terrain autour de vos villes et construire des routes permettant d'établir des itinéraires commerciaux (ils sont plus rapides que les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ouvriers[COLOR_REVERT], surtout lorsqu'il s'agit de décontaminer).
TEXT.German: Wie [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bautrupps[COLOR_REVERT] verbessern auch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Klone[COLOR_REVERT] das Land um Ihre Städte herum und bauen Straßen, um Handelswege zu erstellen. (Sie sind schneller als [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bautrupps[COLOR_REVERT], vor allem bei der Fallout-Entfernung.)
TEXT.Italian: Come i [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lavoratori[COLOR_REVERT], i [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cloni[COLOR_REVERT] migliorano la terra attorno alle tue città, e costruiscono strade che permettono di stabilire rotte commerciali. (Sono più veloci dei [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lavoratori[COLOR_REVERT], specialmente nella bonifica dalle scorie radioattive.)
TEXT.Spanish: Al igual que los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trabajadores[COLOR_REVERT], los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Clones[COLOR_REVERT] mejoran la tierra que rodea las ciudades y construyen carreteras que ayudan a establecer rutas comerciales. Y son más rápidos que los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trabajadores[COLOR_REVERT], especialmente en descontaminar la lluvia radiactiva.

TEXT.English: Stiletto Boat is a stealth vessel which can carry up to 3 troops.
TEXT.French: Stiletto Boat is a stealth vessel which can carry up to 3 troops.
TEXT.German: Stiletto Boat is a stealth vessel which can carry up to 3 troops.
TEXT.Italian: Stiletto Boat is a stealth vessel which can carry up to 3 troops.
TEXT.Spanish: Stiletto Boat is a stealth vessel which can carry up to 3 troops.

TEXT.English: This early gunpower based seige unit is much more dangerous than the Catapult or Trebuchet.

TEXT.English: Fusion Destroyer is a Hi-tech stealth warship which makes it invisible to most units and it can spot other stealth ships. These vessels cause collateral damage, they can bombard city defenses and they are very good at intercepting enemy aircraft.
TEXT.French: Fusion Destroyer is a Hi-tech stealth warship which makes it invisible to most units and it can spot other stealth ships. These vessels cause collateral damage, they can bombard city defenses and they are very good at intercepting enemy aircraft.

TEXT.English: Fusion Cruiser can carry up to 6 missiles, can sink warships, sees submarines, performs ranged attacks and can bombard city defenses.
TEXT.French: Fusion Cruiser can carry up to 6 missiles, can sink warships, sees submarines, performs ranged attacks and can bombard city defenses.

TEXT.English: Fusion Battleships are the most powerful warships afloat. They can sink most other vessels they meet (though they are vulnerable to submarine and air attack). Further, when attacking Fusion Battleships cause collateral damage to all units in the same space and they can also bombard city defenses.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Robotics[COLOR_REVERT] enables the extremely powerful [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mechanized Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missile Cruiser[COLOR_REVERT] units and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Modern Armor[COLOR_REVERT] unit (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Composites[COLOR_REVERT]). TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mathematics[COLOR_REVERT] enables construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]High Walls[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Great Wall[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Plato's Academy[COLOR_REVERT] wonders. Workers build improvements faster and now they may also construct [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forts[COLOR_REVERT]. Some religions may now construct [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pantheons[COLOR_REVERT] which is the largest building for those religions (equivalent of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] in other religions).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] allows your workers to upgrade your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roads[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Railroads[COLOR_REVERT], vastly increasing your units' movement. TEXT.English: Long Range Bomber is modern era bomber with a range of 16. It can attack land units (and sea units but not very effectively), and they can weaken enemy fortifications. Causes collateral damage.

TEXT.English: Mercenary Infantry is an always hostile unit. It is good against gunpowder units and it has a high withdrawal rate. They are fast to train but they cost 250 gold each and each Mercenary unit in-game increases the base cost of this unit type by 30%.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Alphabet[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Research[COLOR_REVERT] and lets you build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Research[COLOR_REVERT] in cities.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Animal Husbandry[COLOR_REVERT] allows your workers to build the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pasture[COLOR_REVERT] improvement and it reveals [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horse[COLOR_REVERT] resource. The tech allows you to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Butchery[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tannery[COLOR_REVERT] buildings.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Assembly Line[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Early Destroyer[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pre-Dreadnought[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Screw Propeller[COLOR_REVERT]). It also enables construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT] building and is required for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal Plant[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oil Plant[COLOR_REVERT]. The tech enables [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Corporate[COLOR_REVERT] welfare civic.
